law.catch_line: Appropriation Laws For Commonwealth Expenses; Subject Matter
law.text: [ Text of section effective until January 1, 2013. For text effective January 1, 2013, see below.] A law making an appropriation for expenses of the commonwealth shall not contain provisions on any other subject matter. As used in this section, expenses of the commonwealth shall include expenses of the executive, legislative, and judicial departments, interest, payments on the public debt, local aid, and other items of expense authorized or required by existing law.
